languages.text: {n}Целые континенты Кьявы Гамма погасли, вынуждая культистов осадить распределительные святилища Движущей Силы. Там их уже ждали во всеоружии защитники мира, готовые уничтожать как схизматикалей, так и "инфоангелов".{/n}

{n}Entire continents went dark on Kiava Gamma, forcing the cultists to lay siege to the Motive Force's distribution sancta. It was there that the world's defenders were lying in wait, armed and ready to destroy both schismaticals and "data-angels" alike.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Целые континенты Кьявы Гамма погасли, вынуждая культистов осадить распределительные святилища Движущей Силы. Там их уже ждали во всеоружии защитники мира, готовые уничтожать как схизматикалей, так и "инфоангелов".{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Entire continents went dark on Kiava Gamma, forcing the cultists to besiege Motive Force distribution sancta. It was there that the world's defenders were waiting for them, armed and ready to destroy schismaticals and "data-angels" alike.{/n}

{n}Entire continents went dark on Kiava Gamma, forcing the cultists to besiege Motive Force distribution sancta. It was there that the world's defenders were waiting for them, armed and ready to destroy schismaticals and "data-angels" alike.{/n}

{n}Entire continents went dark on Kiava Gamma, forcing the cultists to lay siege to the Motive Force's distribution sancta. It was there that the world's defenders were lying in wait, armed and ready to destroy both schismaticals and "data-angels" alike.{/n}

{n}Entire continents went dark on Kiava Gamma, forcing the cultists to lay siege to the Motive Force's distribution sancta. It was there that the world's defenders were lying in wait, armed and ready to destroy both schismaticals and "data-angels" alike.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Als auf Kiava Gamma ganze Kontinente in Dunkelheit versanken, waren die Kultisten gezwungen, ihre Waffen gegen das Distributionssancta der Antriebskraft zu richten. Dort legten sich die bewaffneten Verteidiger auf die Lauer, um Schismatiker und 'Datenengel' gleichermaßen zu vernichten.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Entire continents went dark on Kiava Gamma, forcing the cultists to lay siege to the Motive Force's distribution sancta. It was there that the world's defenders were lying in wait, armed and ready to destroy both schismaticals and "data-angels" alike.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Als auf Kiava Gamma ganze Kontinente in Dunkelheit versanken, waren die Kultisten gezwungen, ihre Waffen gegen das Distributionssancta der Antriebskraft zu richten. Dort legten sich die bewaffneten Verteidiger auf die Lauer, um Schismatiker und 'Datenengel' gleichermaßen zu vernichten.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kiava Gama'da bütün kıtalar karanlığa gömüldü ve bu durum, tarikatçıları Devinim Gücü'nün dağıtım kutaklarını kuşatmaya zorladı. Dünyanın savunucuları, hem bölücüleri hem de "veri meleklerini" yok etmeye hazır ve silahlanmış bir şekilde orada pusuya yattı.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Entire continents went dark on Kiava Gamma, forcing the cultists to lay siege to the Motive Force's distribution sancta. It was there that the world's defenders were lying in wait, armed and ready to destroy both schismaticals and "data-angels" alike.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Kiava Gama'da bütün kıtalar karanlığa gömüldü ve bu durum, tarikatçıları Devinim Gücü'nün dağıtım kutaklarını kuşatmaya zorladı. Dünyanın savunucuları, hem bölücüleri hem de "veri meleklerini" yok etmeye hazır ve silahlanmış bir şekilde orada pusuya yattı.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Continentes enteros quedaron a oscuras en Kiava Gamma, lo cual forzó a los sectarios a atacar los santuarios de distribución de la Fuerza Motriz. Pero las fuerzas de defensa planetarias estaban esperándolos, armadas y listas para destruir a cismáticos y «ángeles de datos» por igual.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Entire continents went dark on Kiava Gamma, forcing the cultists to lay siege to the Motive Force's distribution sancta. It was there that the world's defenders were lying in wait, armed and ready to destroy both schismaticals and "data-angels" alike.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Continentes enteros quedaron a oscuras en Kiava Gamma, lo cual forzó a los sectarios a atacar los santuarios de distribución de la Fuerza Motriz. Pero las fuerzas de defensa planetarias estaban esperándolos, armadas y listas para destruir a cismáticos y «ángeles de datos» por igual.{/n}

languages.text: {n}基亚瓦伽马星一片片区域相继陷入黑暗，邪教徒不得不聚集力量，准备围攻负责分配源力的圣殿。在那里，基亚瓦伽马星的守护者早已设好了埋伏，准备将分离者和数据天使统统消灭。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Entire continents went dark on Kiava Gamma, forcing the cultists to lay siege to the Motive Force's distribution sancta. It was there that the world's defenders were lying in wait, armed and ready to destroy both schismaticals and "data-angels" alike.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}基亚瓦伽马星一片片区域相继陷入黑暗，邪教徒不得不聚集力量，准备围攻负责分配源力的圣殿。在那里，基亚瓦伽马星的守护者早已设好了埋伏，准备将分离者和数据天使统统消灭。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Des continents entiers de Kiava Gamma se sont retrouvés plongés dans l'obscurité, forçant les fanatiques à assiéger les sanctuaires de distribution de la Force Motrice. Mais des défenseurs du monde les y attendaient, armés jusqu'aux dents et prêts à détruire aussi bien les schismatiques que les « anges numériques ».{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Entire continents went dark on Kiava Gamma, forcing the cultists to lay siege to the Motive Force's distribution sancta. It was there that the world's defenders were lying in wait, armed and ready to destroy both schismaticals and "data-angels" alike.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Des continents entiers de Kiava Gamma se sont retrouvés plongés dans l'obscurité, forçant les fanatiques à assiéger les sanctuaires de distribution de la Force Motrice. Mais des défenseurs du monde les y attendaient, armés jusqu'aux dents et prêts à détruire aussi bien les schismatiques que les « anges numériques ».{/n}

languages.text: {n}キアヴァ・ガンマでは大陸全体が停電し、カルト信者どもはモティブ・フォースの供給聖堂を包囲する羽目になった。だがそこでは、この世界を守る人間どもが武装して待ち伏せしており、分派の連中も「データ・エンジェル」もまとめて始末するつもりだった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Entire continents went dark on Kiava Gamma, forcing the cultists to lay siege to the Motive Force's distribution sancta. It was there that the world's defenders were lying in wait, armed and ready to destroy both schismaticals and "data-angels" alike.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}キアヴァ・ガンマでは大陸全体が停電し、カルト信者どもはモティブ・フォースの供給聖堂を包囲する羽目になった。だがそこでは、この世界を守る人間どもが武装して待ち伏せしており、分派の連中も「データ・エンジェル」もまとめて始末するつもりだった。{/n}
